venue.title: Pepe Dome
venue.subtitle: A place Munich has never seen before
venue.description: Since August 1st, 2025, it stands in Ostpark: the Pepe Dome. A geodesic dome surrounded by greenery, creating space for artistry, dance, and culture ‚Äì modern, open, and inspiring. Its height and architecture enable spectacular aerial acrobatics, while the intimate atmosphere makes every encounter feel personal.
venue.uniqueness: Because the Dome stands for only a limited time, every visit has something unique about it.
venue.experienceSubtitle: The Dome offers more than just shows

about.title: Freeman | Time for Artistry
about.subtitle: Celebrating Freedom of Artistic Expression, Rooted in Connection and Unity
about.tagline: Art is freedom. Artistry is freedom. You are free.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Freeman celebrates artistic freedom by bringing together international artists to explore identity, tradition, and innovation through bold, boundary-pushing performance. In a time of rising division, we come together in movement and expression to reclaim freedom‚Äînot just as individuals, but as a collective act of unity.

munich.title: Why Munich?
paragraphs: Munich's history is steeped in artistic rebellion and innovation. From the expressive ruptures of the Blauer Reiter group to the boundary-breaking performances of the Dada movement, the city has long been a ground zero for movements that redefine culture and confront the status quo.

In hosting Freeman here, we honor this radical past‚Äîwhile rooting our vision in the present, where artistic freedom is more necessary than ever in the face of global tensions, censorship, and polarization.

circus.title: Contemporary Artistry as Language
circus.description: Contemporary artistry, with its rejection of definition and tradition, becomes a perfect meeting ground. It offers a radically open space where cultures, techniques, and bodies can speak together. Here, artistry is not bound by genre or geography. It is a place where a rope, a gesture, or a fall can carry the weight of a homeland or the dream of a borderless world.

questions.title: It asks:
items: How do we stay grounded while reaching across cultures?
How can we use our bodies to tell stories that are both personal and political?
What does it mean to reclaim tradition while inventing new languages?

vision.title: Our Chorus of Freedom
vision.description: This festival is not just about celebrating the individual voice‚Äîit's about creating a chorus. A space where freedom becomes collective, where difference is a source of strength, and where unity is not uniformity, but a shared commitment to truth, vulnerability, and artistic courage.

freedom.closing: In Munich, in this moment, we come together‚Äîacross borders and disciplines.

cta.title: Become Part of the Movement
cta.subtitle: Experience artistic freedom in its purest form
